functions.name: Radar Range Scale Number
functions.valueDescription: Range in kilometers, 0 is off / no range. Other values 15, 30, 60 and 120

functions.description: First number of mach meter's numeric display

functions.description: First decimal of mach meter's numeric display

functions.name: Mach Meter Second Decimal 0_0X
functions.description: First decimal of mach meter's numeric display

functions.name: ADI Pitch
functions.valueDescription: Pitch in degrees, -180 to 180, 0 is level, extemes are upside down level

functions.name: ADI Heading
functions.valueDescription: Heading in degrees, -180 to 180, 0 is south

functions.name: ADI Roll
functions.valueDescription: Roll in degrees, -180 to 180. 0 is level

functions.name: ADI Vertical ILS
functions.description: ILS Vertical needle offset (left/right from glidepath)
functions.valueDescription: Needle horizontal offset from center line -1 to 1

functions.name: ADI Horizontal ILS
functions.description: ILS Horizontal needle offset (up/down from glidepath)
functions.valueDescription: Needle vertical offset from center line -1 to 1

functions.description: Last digit of four digit barometric pressure in hectopascals (hPa)

functions.description: Second digit of four digit barometric pressure in hectopascals (hPa)

functions.name: Barometric QFE 1000 hPa X000
functions.description: First digit of four digit barometric pressure in hectopascals (hPa)

functions.name: Backup Pitch
functions.valueDescription: -1 to 1. 0 is level, -1 is 70 degrees nose down, 1 is 70 degrees nose up

functions.name: Backup QFE 1000 hPa X000
functions.description: First digit of four digit barometric pressure in hectopascals (hPa)

functions.name: CI Heading
functions.valueDescription: Central Indicator Heading in degrees, -180 to 180, 0 is South.
